name: claude-secure-plugins
description: Security-first Claude Code plugins with audited configurations and secure defaults

plugins.name: docker-compose-secure
plugins.description: Generate Docker Compose configurations with security hardening: localhost port binding, no-new-privileges, health checks

plugins.name: kubernetes-secure
plugins.description: Generate Kubernetes manifests with PodSecurityContext, NetworkPolicies, and resource limits by default

plugins.name: security-scanner
plugins.description: Scan Docker Compose, Kubernetes, and Terraform files for security misconfigurations and exposed ports

plugins.name: secrets-validator
plugins.description: Detect exposed secrets, API keys, passwords, and credentials in code and configuration files
